original: The BTSA (Brevet de Technicien Supérieur Agricole) in water professions encompasses various educational pathways focused on water management and control. This includes specialized programs such as BTS GEMEAU, which emphasizes water management and regional controls, and BTSA Agricultural, Biological, and Biotechnological Analyses (ANABIOTEC).
